overview:
A creative technology specialist, Scott Burton helps clients reduce complex problems into workflows and action, specializing in creating technology solutions for companies in the creative arts - music, broadcasting, advertising and film.

Scott is the creator of FileBox Pro, www.fileboxpro.net, which is used by content producers, studios, artists and bands to organize and share their work with clients and collaborators.

Scott has been fortunate to work with some of the great artists, advertisers, and personalities of our time. Scott has worked on advertising campaigns for great products that everyone knows, such as BMW, Firestone, Zales, Volkswagen & Hyundai, plus less well-knowns, like Alegent Health Care, Reliant Energy, 21st Century Insurance and First National Bank. He’s produced music that branded FX Networks’ “Sons Of Anarchy”, and rebranded the Starz! and TNT Networks with musical promotional packages.

His work has been recognized with three Top 10’s from Shoot Magazine, the advertising industry’s main trade magazine for production, for Zales “String”, Florida Citrus “Miracle”, and Hyundai “Drumline” television advertisements.
